TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MailMessage extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable

summary.span: 表示可以使用 類別傳送的電子郵件訊息。

span.span: Represents an email message that can be sent using the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 執行個體類別用來建構電子郵件訊息傳送到 SMTP 伺服器進行傳遞使用類別。Instances of the class are used to construct email messages that are transmitted to an SMTP server for delivery using the class. 可做為參數指定寄件者、 收件者、 主旨和電子郵件訊息的本文時用來初始化物件。The sender, recipient, subject, and body of an email message may be specified as parameters when a is used to initialize a object. 這些參數可能也會設定或使用上的屬性存取物件。These parameters may also be set or accessed using properties on the object. 主要的郵件訊息標頭和訊息的項目可能會使用設定的下列屬性類別。The primary mail message headers and elements for the message may be set using the following properties of the class. |郵件標頭或組件Mail header or part|屬性Property| |-------------------------|--------------| |附件Attachments|| |密件副本 (BCC)Blind carbon copies (BCC)|| |副本 (CC)Carbon copies (CC)|| |Content-TypeContent-Type|| |自訂標頭的編碼方式Encoding for custom headers|| |訊息內文Message body|| |優先權Priority|| |收件者Recipient|| |收件者Reply-To|| |寄件者Sender|| |主旨Subject|| 類別也可讓應用程式存取的訊息使用的標頭集合屬性。The class also allows an application to access the headers collection for the message using the property. 雖然這個集合是唯讀的 （新的集合可以不設定），自訂標頭可以加入或刪除從這個集合。While this collection is read-only (a new collection can not be set), custom headers can be added to or deleted from this collection. 新增的任何自訂標頭會包含當傳送執行個體。Any custom headers added will be included when the instance is sent. 只有標頭傳送訊息之前，特別加入至這個集合中集合中包含的屬性。Before a message is sent, only headers specifically added to this collection in the property are included in the collection. 之後傳送執行個體，屬性也會包含設定使用之屬性相關聯的標頭類別或參數傳遞時用來初始化物件。After a the instance is sent, the property will also include headers that are set using the associated properties of the class or parameters passed when a is used to initialize a object. 如果某些郵件標頭格式不正確，它們可能會導致損毀的電子郵件訊息。If some mail headers are malformed, they could cause the email message to become corrupted. 因此任何可以使用屬性上設定的標頭集合中的郵件標頭類別應該只能透過設定類別屬性，或做為參數傳遞時初始化物件。So any mail header in the headers collection that can be set using a property on the class should only be set using the class property or as a parameter passed when a initializes a object. 以下清單中的郵件標頭不能加入使用屬性和任何值設定為使用這些標頭屬性將會捨棄或傳送訊息時，覆寫：The following list of mail headers should not be added using the property and any values set for these headers using the property will be discarded or overwritten when the message is sent: - BccBcc - CcCc - Content-IDContent-ID - Content-LocationContent-Location - Content-Transfer-EncodingContent-Transfer-Encoding - Content-TypeContent-Type - 日期Date - 從From - 重要性Importance - MIME-VersionMIME-Version - 優先權Priority - 收件者Reply-To - 寄件者Sender - 以To - X 優先順序X-Priority 如果應用程式並不指定 X 寄件者標頭使用屬性，傳送訊息時，類別會建立一個。If the application does not specify an X-Sender header using the property, the class will create one when the message is sent. 使用屬性來指定以不同格式的電子郵件訊息的複本。Use the property to specify copies of an email message in different formats. 例如，如果您在 HTML 中傳送一則訊息，您也可以提供純文字版本，如果使用電子郵件無法顯示 HTML 內容的讀取器部分收件者。For example, if you send a message in HTML, you might also want to provide a plain text version in case some of the recipients use email readers that cannot display HTML content. 如需示範如何使用替代檢視建立訊息的範例，請參閱。For an example that demonstrates creating a message with alternate views, see . 使用屬性來新增到電子郵件的附件。Use the property to add attachments to an email message. 如需示範如何建立郵件與附件的範例，請參閱。For an example that demonstrates creating a message with an attachment, see . 之後組合您的電子郵件訊息時，可以將該使用或方法。After assembling your email message, you can send it by using the or methods. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立及傳送電子郵件訊息，其中包含附加檔案。The following code example demonstrates creating and sending an email message that includes an attachment. [!code-cpp[NclMailSync#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CPP/NclMailSync.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[NclMailSync#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CS/mail.cs#6)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 新的屬性物件初始化，如下所示：The properties for the new object are initialized as follows: |參數Parameter|屬性Property| |---------------|--------------| |`from`|| |`to`|| |`subject`|| |`body`|| 根據預設的主旨和內容會假設使用預設編碼方式取決於本機電腦設定。By default, the subject and content are assumed to use the default encoding based on local computer settings. 使用和屬性，以指定不同的編碼方式。Use the and properties to specify different encodings. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何呼叫這個建構函式。The following code example demonstrates calling this constructor. MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AlternateViews As AlternateViewCollection

summary.span: 取得附件集合，用於儲存訊息主體的替代格式。

span.span: Gets the attachment collection used to store alternate forms of the message body.
A writable .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定以不同格式的電子郵件訊息的複本。Use the property to specify copies of an email message in different formats. 例如，如果您在 HTML 中傳送一則訊息，您也可以提供純文字版本，如果使用電子郵件無法顯示 HTML 內容的讀取器部分收件者。For example, if you send a message in HTML, you might also want to provide a plain text version in case some of the recipients use email readers that cannot display HTML content. 若要加入至替代檢視物件，請建立檢視中，然後將它新增至所傳回的集合。To add an alternate view to a object, create an for the view, and then add it to the collection returned by . 使用屬性以指定的文字版本使用集合，指定檢視與其他的 MIME 類型。Use the property to specify the text version and use the collection to specify views with other MIME types. 使用類別來指定替代的檢視的 MIME 類型的成員。Use the class members to specify the MIME type for the alternate view. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立及傳送電子郵件訊息與純文字和 HTML 的替代檢視。The following code example demonstrates creating and sending an email message with a plain text and an HTML alternate view. [!code-cpp[NclMailSync#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CPP/NclMailSync.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[NclMailSync#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CS/mail.cs#5)]

public: property System::Net::Mail::AttachmentCollection ^ Attachments { System::Net::Mail::AttachmentCollection ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得附件集合，用於儲存附加到這個電子郵件訊息的資料。

span.span: Gets the attachment collection used to store data attached to this email message.
A writable .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用所傳回的集合加入附件，例如檔案或內容屬性，至此。Use the collection returned by the property to add an attachment, such as a file or the contents of a , to this . 建立，包含或參考的資料連接，然後再新增所傳回的集合來。Create an that contains or references the data to be attached, and then add the to the collection returned by . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立及傳送電子郵件與附件。The following code example demonstrates creating and sending an email message with an attachment. [!code-cpp[NclMailSync#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CPP/NclMailSync.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[NclMailSync#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CS/mail.cs#6)]

public: property System::Net::Mail::MailAddressCollection ^ Bcc { System::Net::Mail::MailAddressCollection ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得地址集合，其中包含這個電子郵件訊息的密件副本 (BCC) 收件者。

span.span: Gets the address collection that contains the blind carbon copy (BCC) recipients for this email message.
A writable object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要加入的電子郵件訊息 密件副本收件者，請建立收件者的地址，，然後將該物件加入至所傳回的集合屬性。To add a BCC recipient to an email message, create a for the recipient's address, and then add that object to the collection returned by the property. 當收件者檢視電子郵件訊息，位址通常不會顯示。When recipients view an email message, the addresses are usually not displayed. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何將地址處理集合。The following code example demonstrates adding an address to the address collection. [!code-cpp[NclMailSync#9](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CPP/NclMailSync.cpp#9)] [!code-csharp[NclMailSync#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CS/mail.cs#9)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Body { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定訊息主體。

span.span: Gets or sets the message body.
A value that contains the body text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的內容為"text/plain"。The of the content is "text/plain". 指定的主體所使用的編碼屬性。Specify the encoding used for the body with the property. 若本文內容中提供更豐富的呈現方式選項，收件者的其他格式，可以使用指定的本文內容的替代檢視屬性。If the body content is available in alternative formats that provide richer presentation options for the recipients, you can specify alternate views for the body content by using the property. 例如，應用程式可能會選擇傳送純文字本文和訊息內文的 HTML 版本。For example, an application might choose to send both the plain text body and an HTML version of the message body. 電子郵件的讀取器可以顯示 HTML 可以呈現 HTML 版本的內文的收件者，而無法顯示 HTML 的讀取器會顯示訊息的純文字版改為。Email readers that can display HTML can present the HTML version of the body to the recipient, while readers that cannot display HTML will display the plain text version of the message instead. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定屬性。The following code example demonstrates setting the property. [!code-cpp[NclMailSync#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CPP/NclMailSync.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[NclMailSync#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CS/mail.cs#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Text::Encoding ^ BodyEncoding { System::Text::Encoding ^ get(); void set(System::Text::Encoding ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定用來對訊息主體進行編碼的編碼方式。

span.span: Gets or sets the encoding used to encode the message body.
An applied to the contents of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定的值屬性會設定內容類型標頭中的字元組的欄位。The value specified for the property sets the character set field in the Content-Type header. 預設的字元集是`"us-ascii"`。The default character set is `"us-ascii"`. 如果您設定屬性， ，或，架構也會選取的這個。If you set the property to , , or , the Framework selects a of for this . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範如何建立使用 UTF8 編碼方式的郵件訊息。The following code example demonstrates creating a mail message that uses UTF8 encoding. [!code-cpp[NclMailAsync#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclMailASync/cpp/mailasync.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[NclMailAsync#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclMailASync/CS/mailasync.cs#3)] [!code-vb[NclMailAsync#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclMailASync/vb/mailasync.vb#3)]

span.span: Gets or sets the transfer encoding used to encode the message body.
Returns .
A applied to the contents of the .

summary.span: 釋放 使用的資源。

span.span: Releases the resources used by the .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的所有資源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您完成使用 後，請呼叫 方法。Call the method when you are finished using the . 方法會將 保留在無法使用的狀態。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 在呼叫，您必須釋放所有參考讓記憶體回收行程可以回收記憶體的所佔用。After calling , you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 在您釋放最後一個 參考之前，請務必呼叫 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何透過將處置。The following code example demonstrates disposing a .

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源， 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose()`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設定為`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 叫用`Dispose`與`disposing`設`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 當`disposing`參數為 true，這個方法的任何 managed 物件所持有的資源全部釋出這個參考。When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 在覆寫小心不要參考物件已處置過的早期呼叫中。

span.span: When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 如需有關如何實作，請參閱[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 如需有關和，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[覆寫 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Net::Mail::MailAddress ^ From { System::Net::Mail::MailAddress ^ get(); void set(System::Net::Mail::MailAddress ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定這個電子郵件訊息的寄件者地址。

span.span: Gets or sets the from address for this email message.
A that contains the from address information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 從位址未驗證或繫結至目前登入的使用者。The from address is not validated or tied to the currently logged on user. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範如何設定的值屬性。The following code example demonstrates setting a value for the property. [!code-cpp[NclMailSync#10](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CPP/NclMailSync.cpp#10)] [!code-csharp[NclMailSync#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CS/mail.cs#10)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Headers As NameValueCollection

summary.span: 取得與這個電子郵件訊息一起傳送的電子郵件標頭。

span.span: Gets the email headers that are transmitted with this email message.

value.span: A ，其中包含電子郵件標頭。

span.span: A that contains the email headers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可讓應用程式存取訊息的標頭集合。The property allows an application to access the headers collection for the message. 雖然這個集合是唯讀的 （新的集合可以不設定），自訂標頭可以加入或刪除從這個集合。While this collection is read-only (a new collection can not be set), custom headers can be added to or deleted from this collection. 新增的任何自訂標頭會包含當傳送執行個體。Any custom headers added will be included when the instance is sent. 只有標頭傳送訊息之前，特別加入至這個集合中集合中包含的屬性。Before a message is sent, only headers specifically added to this collection in the property are included in the collection. 之後傳送執行個體，屬性也會包含設定使用之屬性相關聯的標頭類別或參數傳遞時用來初始化物件。After the instance is sent, the property will also include headers that are set using the associated properties of the class or parameters passed when a is used to initialize a object. 如果某些郵件標頭格式不正確，它們可能會導致損毀的電子郵件訊息。If some mail headers are malformed, they could cause the email message to become corrupted. 因此任何可以使用屬性上設定的標頭集合中的郵件標頭類別應該只能透過設定類別屬性，或做為參數傳遞時初始化物件。So any mail header in the headers collection that can be set using a property on the class should only be set using the class property or as a parameter passed when a initializes a object. 以下清單中的郵件標頭不能加入使用屬性和任何值設定為使用這些標頭屬性將會捨棄或傳送訊息時，覆寫：The following list of mail headers should not be added using the property and any values set for these headers using the property will be discarded or overwritten when the message is sent: - BccBcc - CcCc - Content-IDContent-ID - Content-LocationContent-Location - Content-Transfer-EncodingContent-Transfer-Encoding - Content-TypeContent-Type - 日期Date - 從From - 重要性Importance - MIME-VersionMIME-Version - 優先權Priority - 收件者Reply-To - 寄件者Sender - 以To - X 優先順序X-Priority 如果應用程式並不指定 X 寄件者標頭使用屬性，傳送訊息時，類別會建立一個。If the application does not specify an X-Sender header using the property, the class will create one when the message is sent. 可做為參數指定寄件者、 收件者、 主旨和電子郵件訊息的本文時用來初始化物件。The sender, recipient, subject, and body of an email message may be specified as parameters when a is used to initialize a object. 這些參數可能也會設定或使用上的屬性存取物件。These parameters may also be set or accessed using properties on the object. 主要的郵件訊息標頭和訊息的項目可能會使用設定的下列屬性類別。The primary mail message headers and elements for the message may be set using the following properties of the class. |郵件標頭或組件Mail header or part|屬性Property| |-------------------------|--------------| |附件Attachments|| |密件副本 (BCC)Blind carbon copies (BCC)|| |副本 (CC)Carbon copies (CC)|| |Content-TypeContent-Type|| |自訂標頭的編碼方式Encoding for custom headers|| |訊息內文Message body|| |優先權Priority|| |收件者Recipient|| |收件者Reply-To|| |寄件者Sender|| |主旨Subject|| ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範如何顯示郵件訊息的標頭。The following code example demonstrates displaying the headers for a mail message. [!code-cpp[NclMailSync#24](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CPP/NclMailSync.cpp#24)] [!code-csharp[NclMailSync#24](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CS/mail.cs#24)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Text::Encoding ^ HeadersEncoding { System::Text::Encoding ^ get(); void set(System::Text::Encoding ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定編碼，此編碼會用於此電子郵件訊息中的使用者定義自訂標頭。

span.span: Gets or sets the encoding used for the user-defined custom headers for this email message.

value.span: 用於使用者定義此電子郵件訊息的自訂標頭的編碼方式。

span.span: The encoding used for user-defined custom headers for this email message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值屬性預設為。The value of the property defaults to . SMTP 訊息是由標頭和本文部分所組成。SMTP messages consist of headers and body parts. IETF Rfc smtp 限制的標頭和本文部分的名稱是 ASCII。The IETF RFCs for SMTP restrict the header and body part names to be ASCII. 不過，IETF Rfc 所允許的標頭和本文部分值，來包含 Unicode 字元。However, the IETF RFCs allow header and body part values to contain Unicode characters. 在任何特定值，如果存在非 ASCII 字元，然後編碼值使用組合的字元編碼 （UTF8 或 Shift JIS，例如） 後面接著位元組編碼方式 (或例如)。In any particular value, if non-ASCII characters exist, then the value is encoded using a combination of character encoding (UTF8 or Shift-JIS, for example) followed by byte encoding ( or for example). 結果通常是 ASCII 字元會在網路傳輸資料流中。The result is usually that only ASCII characters are in the network transmission stream.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsBodyHtml { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出郵件訊息主體是否採用 HTML 格式。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the mail message body is in HTML.

value.span: 如果訊息主體為 HTML。其他。

span.span: if the message body is in HTML; else .
The default is .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Net::Mail::MailPriority Priority { System::Net::Mail::MailPriority get(); void set(System::Net::Mail::MailPriority value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定這個電子郵件訊息的優先權。

span.span: Gets or sets the priority of this email message.
A that contains the priority of this message.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Net::Mail::MailAddress ^ ReplyTo { System::Net::Mail::MailAddress ^ get(); void set(System::Net::Mail::MailAddress ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定郵件訊息的 ReplyTo 地址。

span.span: Gets or sets the ReplyTo address for the mail message.
A MailAddress that indicates the value of the field.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來表示一個位址以外用於回覆此訊息的位址。Use the property to indicate an address other than the address to use to reply to this message.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ReplyToList As MailAddressCollection
public: property System::Net::Mail::MailAddressCollection ^ ReplyToList { System::Net::Mail::MailAddressCollection ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得郵件訊息回覆的地址清單。

span.span: Gets the list of addresses to reply to for the mail message.

value.span: 要對郵件訊息回覆時的地址清單。

span.span: The list of the addresses to reply to for the mail message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來表示的位址清單以外用於回覆此訊息的位址。Use the property to indicate the list of addresses other than the address to use to reply to this message. 屬性取代只允許單一回覆位址的屬性。The property replaces the property that only allows a single address to reply to.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Net::Mail::MailAddress ^ Sender { System::Net::Mail::MailAddress ^ get(); void set(System::Net::Mail::MailAddress ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定這個電子郵件訊息的寄件者地址。

span.span: Gets or sets the sender's address for this email message.
A that contains the sender's address information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 寄件者地址未驗證或繫結至目前登入的使用者。The sender's address is not validated or tied to the currently logged on user.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Subject { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定這個電子郵件訊息的主旨。

span.span: Gets or sets the subject line for this email message.
A that contains the subject content.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定使用主體所使用的編碼屬性。Specify the encoding used for the subject by using the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定屬性。The following code example demonstrates setting the property. MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Text::Encoding ^ SubjectEncoding { System::Text::Encoding ^ get(); void set(System::Text::Encoding ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定這個電子郵件訊息之主旨內容所用的編碼方式。

span.span: Gets or sets the encoding used for the subject content for this email message.
An that was used to encode the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果郵件代理程式有問題的，使用。If a mail agent has difficulty with a of , use . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定屬性。The following code example demonstrates setting the property. MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property To As MailAddressCollection
public: property System::Net::Mail::MailAddressCollection ^ To { System::Net::Mail::MailAddressCollection ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得地址集合，其中包含這個電子郵件訊息的收件者。

span.span: Gets the address collection that contains the recipients of this email message.
A writable object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性用來指定上一封電子郵件的收件者欄位的位址。The property is used to designate the addresses on the To line of an email message. 若要加入的電子郵件訊息的收件者，請建立收件者地址，，然後將該物件加入至這個屬性所傳回的集合。To add a recipient to an email message, create a for the recipient's address, and then add that object to the collection returned by this property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定屬性。The following code example demonstrates setting the property. [!code-cpp[NclMailSync#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CPP/NclMailSync.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[NclMailSync#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CS/mail.cs#7)]
